name: HockeyStack
headline: The operating system for inbound B2B revenue
description:
HockeyStack improves sales outcomes for B2B companies by helping them record and understand every interaction their customers have with their marketing, sales reps, CSMs, and products. 

We map every customer touchpoint from ad impression to closed won and to upsell using our own tracking script and native integrations to the B2B GTM tech stack. 

Building this source of truth allow us to give companies previously hidden insights that generate incremental revenue, such as:

- Deploy marketing budget: "Launch this ad campaign to this audience to generate $XM in pipeline"
- Target the right accounts with the right messaging: "These accounts have the highest likelihood to convert, put them on this email sequence"
- Convert more of the pipeline: “Pied Piper hasn't visited the site for 8 days; give Jim a phone call”
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:analytics; industry:sales; industry:marketing; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Buğra Gündüz, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO @ HockeyStack. I started learning to code as a child, started selling digital products online in my freshman year of high school in Turkey, went to the US for college & dropped out during my first quarter to build HockeyStack.

founders.name: Emir Atli, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CRO at HockeyStack- the revenue infrastructure for B2B. One of the fastest growing YC companies, used by Outreach, Appsflyer, Yext, Sendoso, 8x8, and more. Hiring engineers, recruiters, and marketers in SF!

## Frequently asked questions
How long does the setup and onboarding take?
Connecting all of your data sources takes just a few minutes. The onboarding process, which includes building initial dashboards, user training, and setting goals, takes four weeks on average. Most customers see the value within the first 45 days.
Do I need technical knowledge to implement Hockeystack?
You need to have a marketing operations / revenue operations resource to implement HockeyStack efficiently, but HockeyStack doesn't require any coding, and all functionality is self-serve.
What tools do you integrate with?
HockeyStack integrates with leading CRM, ABM, Marketing Automation, and advertising platforms. [Learn more about our integrations.](https://hockeystack.com/<https:/staging-marketing-hockeystack.webflow.io/integrations>)
What makes HockeyStack different?
HockeyStack helps you create and capture more pipeline by showing you the holistic funnel and buyer journey instead of just department-level analytics. It is fully customizable and is the only tool that allows you to build any report you need without any code. [Learn more about what makes us different.](https://hockeystack.com/<https:/staging-marketing-hockeystack.webflow.io/advantages>)
What is cookieless tracking and how does it work?
Analytics platforms usually use cookies to track users. Use of cookies has recently come under scrutiny by privacy legislators, and have been severely restricted. 
Everything you see here works without cookies by default. You still have the option to switch to cookie-based tracking. [Read our article on our cookieless tracking technology to learn more.](https://hockeystack.com/<https:/hockeystack.com/blog-posts/how-does-hockeystack-track-users>)
Where do you store the data? How privacy-friendly is HockeyStack?
We store your data on AWS servers in Frankfurt, Germany. We don't collect any personal information by default, including IP addresses. We follow GDPR and CCPA regulations. [Read our privacy policy to learn more.](https://hockeystack.com/<https:/hockeystack.com/privacy-policy>)
## Ready to see HockeyStack in action?
HockeyStack turns all of your online and offline GTM data into visual buyer journeys and dashboards, AI-powered recommendations, and the industry’s best-performing account and lead scoring.

## Frequently asked questions
How long does the setup and onboarding take?
Connecting all of your data sources takes just a few minutes. The onboarding process, which includes building initial dashboards, user training, and setting goals, takes four weeks on average. Most customers see the value within the first 45 days.
Do I need technical knowledge to implement Hockeystack?
You need to have a marketing operations / revenue operations resource to implement HockeyStack efficiently, but HockeyStack doesn't require any coding, and all functionality is self-serve.
What tools do you integrate with?
HockeyStack integrates with leading CRM, ABM, Marketing Automation, and advertising platforms. Learn more about our integrations.⟨84⟩
What makes HockeyStack different?
HockeyStack helps you create and capture more pipeline by showing you the holistic funnel and buyer journey instead of just department-level analytics. It is fully customizable and is the only tool that allows you to build any report you need without any code. Learn more about what makes us different.⟨85⟩
What is cookieless tracking and how does it work?
Analytics platforms usually use cookies to track users. Use of cookies has recently come under scrutiny by privacy legislators, and have been severely restricted. 
Everything you see here works without cookies by default. You still have the option to switch to cookie-based tracking. Read our article on our cookieless tracking technology to learn more.⟨86⟩
Where do you store the data? How privacy-friendly is HockeyStack?
We store your data on AWS servers in Frankfurt, Germany. We don't collect any personal information by default, including IP addresses. We follow GDPR and CCPA regulations. Read our privacy policy to learn more.⟨87⟩
## Ready to see HockeyStack in action?
HockeyStack turns all of your online and offline GTM data into visual buyer journeys and dashboards, AI-powered recommendations, and the industry’s best-performing account and lead scoring.

**HockeyStack: The Go-To Platform for Inbound B2B Revenue**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch S23, HockeyStack has set its sights on revolutionizing how B2B companies track and leverage customer interactions. With a compact team of 11 based in San Francisco, their mission is crystal clear: to act as the operating system for inbound B2B revenue.

### What They Offer

HockeyStack enhances sales performance for B2B enterprises by meticulously recording every customer interaction—from ad impressions to sales close and upsells. They employ a proprietary tracking script along with seamless integrations into various components of the B2B go-to-market (GTM) tech stack. This allows businesses to construct a comprehensive "source of truth," unveiling previously hidden insights that directly correlate to increased revenues.

### Key Insights and Use Cases

1. **Optimized Marketing Budget Deployment:** With insights such as "launch this ad campaign to generate $XM in the pipeline," marketing teams can deploy budgets strategically.
   
2. **Targeted Account Messaging:** HockeyStack identifies high-conversion accounts, suggesting specific email sequences for enhanced outreach.

3. **Pipeline Conversion Improvements:** The platform flags accounts requiring attention, like “Pied Piper hasn’t visited the site for 8 days; give Jim a call,” enabling proactive engagement.

### Recent Developments

HockeyStack recently celebrated a $20 million Series A funding round led by Bessemer Venture Partners, which signifies robust investor confidence in their model and capabilities. 

### The Competitive Edge

What sets HockeyStack apart is their cookieless tracking technology that provides accurate user data without the ethical gray areas that come with traditional cookie-based tracking. The focus remains on B2B analytics that retain privacy compliance while offering deep insights into buyer journeys.

### Client Success Stories

HockeyStack has claimed several significant wins, including:
- **ActiveCampaign:** Achieved 100% of their revenue targets after reducing ad spend by 50%.
- **Oneflow:** Doubled their lead-to-customer metrics through improved revenue attribution.

These testimonials and case studies highlight a trend: clients are discovering enhanced visibility and attribution accuracy in their sales funnels by utilizing HockeyStack.

### Conclusion

For companies navigating the complexities of B2B marketing and sales, HockeyStack serves as a pivotal partner. Their laser focus on enhancing revenues through data-driven insights makes them a valuable player in the SaaS arena. With growing recognition, this is a platform to watch. For further exploration, check out their website at [HockeyStack](https://hockeystack.com).
